bill.summary:
U.S. Women's National Soccer Team Congressional Gold Medal Act
This bill directs the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the President pro tempore of the Senate to arrange for the presentation of a Congressional Gold Medal to the United States Women's National Team, in recognition of their contributions and commitment to soccer, women's sports, inclusion, and pay equity.
The medal shall be given to the Smithsonian Institution and made available for display and research.
